ISSUE.TITLE: How do I create an empty directory?
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: This is what I tried: curl -X PUT "http://localhost:8888/test/" => {"error":"can not to write to folder /test/ without a file name"} curl -X POST "http://localhost:8888/test/" => {"error":"request Content-Type isn't multipart/form-data"} curl -X PUT "http://localhost:8888/test" => creates a 0 byte file curl -X POST "http://localhost:8888/test" => {"error":"request Content-Type isn't multipart/form-data"}

COMMIT.MESSAGE: filer: support createing empty folder fix https://github.com/chrislusf/seaweedfs/issues/1161
